markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Swarmsense](/Spells.aspx?ID=2413)
<actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 270

**Domain**
[Swarm](/Domains.aspx?ID=120)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained
</row>

</column>

---

You extend your senses through a multitude of crawling and flying creatures. You create a crawling swarm in your square. You can hear through the swarm as if using your normal auditory senses. When you [Cast this Spell](/Actions.aspx?ID=2734) and the first time you [Sustain](/Actions.aspx?ID=2317) it each round, you can move the swarm 10 feet along the ground in any direction. The swarm has AC 15 and a +0 bonus to its saves. Any damage dealt to the swarm destroys it and ends the spell.

---
**Heightened (3rd)** The swarm has a [climb Speed](/Rules.aspx?ID=2349) of 10 feet.

**Heightened (5th)** The swarm has a [fly Speed](/Rules.aspx?ID=2350) of 10 feet. You can see through the swarm using your visual senses.

**Heightened (7th)** The swarm gains a 10-foot status bonus to its Speeds.
name: Swarmsense
